name: Penn State University Libraries ArcGIS Hub
description: Aggregates geospatial content created by current and former employees and students affiliated with the Donald W. Hamer Center for Maps and Geospatial Information. Features maps, data layers, and applications on topics such as historic aerial photography, land use change, WW2 OSS maps, Sanborn Fire Insurance Maps, and StoryMaps.
owner_name: Donald W. Hamer Center for Maps and Geospatial Information (Penn State University Libraries)
